title: Imam of Peace on Twitter
body: This leader has a vision that goes beyond picking a fight with plastic straws. In just 50 years, he and his late father have achieved more economic growth for the UAE 🇦🇪 than any other country in the world. He was the first to sign and ratify the Paris Agreement, commit to an economy-wide reduction in emissions and announce an initiative to achieve net zero by 2050.
readable_content:
Imam of Peace (2023-07-05): This leader has a vision that goes beyond picking a fight with plastic straws. In just 50 years, he and his late father have achieved more economic growth for the UAE  than any other country in the world. He was the first to sign and ratify the Paris Agreement, commit to an economy-wide reduction in emissions and announce an initiative to achieve net zero by 2050. His country has zero homegrown extremism or terrorism. Above all, he is respected by friends and foes. His name is H.H. Mohamad Bin Zayed, President of The United Arab Emirates.

- Mohamad Bin Zayed (2023-07-05): محمد بن زايد
